February 3, 19&5
Mr. Richard H. Bell, Director
Radio and Television
University of Colorado
Boulder, Colorado
Dear Mr. Belli
As you may have forgotten by this time, when Colby Lewis asked
for suggestions for articles and authors for the Journal. you
offered several good suggestions. One was an article on over¬
seas assignments in STV-Radio, to be written by someone in the
NAEB office.
Enclosed are photocopies of the correspondence between me and
Harold Hill and Jim Fellows. Can you elaborate further for them
on what you have in mind?
So far I haven*t received articles on your other two very fine
suggestions either. However, I haven't received a "no* from
Shayon either, which is encouraging.
As to Fredette and “Why NAEB Individual Membership,* if I don't
hear from him pretty soon I shall take you up on your kind offer
to write it. However, it would be nice, as you suggested, if he,
as chairman of the Individual Member Board for some time, would
write it.
Thanks for your help. And best wishes for the rest of 1965•
Sincerely,
Mrs. Betty McKenzie
Publications Editor
